body_html: This is nice! I guess it might be a good idea to throw a warning that the values are restricted to [0, 255]. It might change the way a few existing codes operate and a warning might save long debugging hours for many.
body_text: This is nice! I guess it might be a good idea to throw a warning that the values are restricted to [0, 255]. It might change the way a few existing codes operate and a warning might save long debugging hours for many.
body: This is nice! I guess it might be a good idea to throw a `warning` that the values are restricted to `[0, 255]`. It might change the way a few existing codes operate and a `warning` might save long debugging hours for many.
